meanings.definition: A member of a society or club.
meanings.sent1: The sodalists gathered for their weekly meeting at the community center.
meanings.sent2: She became a sodalist of the book club to meet new friends.
meanings.sent3: The sodalists decided to have a picnic in the park for their next meeting.
meanings.sent4: In the world of nature, bees can be seen as sodalists working together in a hive.
meanings.sent5: The image of the sodalists in their matching uniforms was quite striking.

meanings.definition: A person who participates in social activities with others.
meanings.sent1: As a sodalist, he enjoyed attending parties and events with his friends.
meanings.sent2: The sodalists organized a charity fundraiser to help the local community.
meanings.sent3: The sodalists laughed and chatted happily during their game night.
meanings.sent4: She was a true sodalist, always ready to lend a helping hand to those in need.
meanings.sent5: The sodalists' bond grew stronger with each shared experience.
